attributes.action: support the Zeitgeist Movement and the Venus Project
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Zeitgeist Movement, along with the Venus Project, support removing the monetary system and replacing it with a resource system to benefit the entire human race by making products free.
This cannot exist while the banks continue to create more debt.
I petition the Prime Minister and the UK government to support this movement for the benefit of everyone.
